originalText.text: I cannot speak highly enough of Mark Giller & One Heart Personalized Ceremonies! Mark took the time to get to know us both as individuals and as a couple, learning our love story and developing a unique ceremony that matched our personalities and senses of humor. Our guests were blown away by the level of detail he incorporated into the ceremony, adding the perfect amounts of sentimental and lightheartedness. He guided us along the way, checking in with us to ensure we felt comfortable and prepared. If you're looking for an officiant that will create a wedding ceremony to be remembered for all the years to come, look no further!

originalText.text: Mark officiated our wedding on 10/15/23. Mark went above and beyond for our wedding. He responded promptly to our questions and concerns leading up to the big day. We both loved how Mark was able to incorporate my Hindu heritage and my husband’s Catholic faith into our ceremony. This made the ceremony special and unique. We received many compliments from our friends and family. Thank you!!

originalText.text:
We found Norma through our venue when we were struggling to decide who should marry us. Norma immediately made us feel at ease & assured us she would personalize our ceremony and make it "us". She did just that and it was such a beautiful, perfect ceremony. She worked with us for the month before our wedding to ask questions, get to know us, and find out our love story. One Heart Ceremonies is so in depth that they make your ceremony feel like they have known you forever.
I highly recommend Norma and her team for a perfect & meaningful ceremony!

originalText.text: My wife and I booked One Heart two years before our wedding. Mark met with us on Zoom after the booking to learn about us and for us to learn about Mark. The process was painless and Mark was always there for any questions we had regarding the ceremony. The ceremony was so beautifully written by Mark and really spoke so well to my wife and I. Mark really took the time to learn about us and put our love story into beautiful words. Many friends and family members reached out to us after the wedding and told us how beautiful the ceremony was. I would 100% recommend One Heart Personalized Ceremonies and Mark for your upcoming event. You will not be disappointed!!

originalText.text: Working with Mark & One Heart was truly an amazing, organic, & seamless experience. Mark was professional, polite, & passionate about giving my wife & I the ceremony we dreamed of. He took is role in our ceremony very seriously & we had the utmost confidence in him that everything would come together as we envisioned it & he delivered & then some. Mark listened to our specific requests and established trust with us early on. If you're looking for a smooth experience, go with One Heart.
